# Heap Lookaside

**AuthorÔºöwnagzihxain
MailÔºötudouboom@163.com**

```
#include <stdio.h>
#include <windows.h>

int main()
{
	HLOCAL h1, h2, h3, h4;
	HANDLE hp;
	hp = HeapCreate(0, 0, 0);
	__asm int 3
	h1 = HeapAlloc(hp, HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY, 8);
	h2 = HeapAlloc(hp, HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY, 8);
	h3 = HeapAlloc(hp, HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY, 16);
	h4 = HeapAlloc(hp, HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY, 24);
	HeapFree(hp, 0, h1);
	HeapFree(hp, 0, h2);
	HeapFree(hp, 0, h3);
	HeapFree(hp, 0, h4);
	h2 = HeapAlloc(hp, HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY, 16);
	HeapFree(hp, 0, h2);
}
```
